name: The Murder of Nicole Brown Simpson
description: Inspired by true events, the film follows OJ Simpson's ex-wife Nicole Brown Simpson in the last days before her tragic death on June 12th 1994, as seen from her point of view.

review.author: ghgaskins
review.heading: Can it be that bad?
review.reviewBody: Yes. It's that bad. Mena Suvari is the Exec Producer for this movie and I wonder where she received funding. This movie is not even worthy of a Lifetime showing. Terrible story, Terrible script, Terrible acting, and Terrible decision of mine to watch. I should have known better. Mena hasn't been in a good movie since American Beauty and it's amazing she's still around.

keywords: o.j. simpson character,bare chested male,male nudity,male rear nudity,murder
